md:
giải nghĩa từ "peonies" sang tiếng việt; đưa ra nghĩa tiếng việt theo từ loại và đưa ra câu ví dụ, các từ liên quan.

* Peonies (n) - Hoa mẫu đơn (hoa)

VD: The garden was filled with beautiful peonies.

* Peony (n) - Mẫu đơn (hoa)

VD: The peony in the garden was blooming.

* Peon (n) - Nô lệ (người)

VD: The peon was forced to work long hours in the field.

* Peonage (n) - Nô lệ, chế độ nô lệ

VD: The country abolished peonage in the 19th century.

* Peonism (n) - Chủ nghĩa nô lệ

VD: The peonism of the ancient society was criticized by historians.

Note: The word "peon" and its related words "peonage" and "peonism" are not commonly used in modern English, and are mostly used in historical or academic contexts. The word "peony" and its plural form "peonies" are more commonly used to refer to the flower.
